function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overpopulated slums at high risk due to virus","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases in overpopulated areas","Mitigation":"Improved sanitation, healthcare access, and public health education","Technologies":"Sanitation infrastructure, telemedicine, public health apps","People":"Residents of overpopulated slums","Owner":"Local governments, NGOs, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Economic breakdown in Iran due to sanctions","Impact":"Inability to provide stimulus packages for economic relief during health crisis","Mitigation":"International cooperation, humanitarian aid, economic reform","Technologies":"Economic modeling, financial technology, trade agreements","People":"Citizens of Iran","Owner":"International organizations, diplomatic bodies, economic advisors"}]}
